title: How many Grammys did Michael Jackson win for Thriller? - Quora

response.answer_text: He won 8 grammys in one night. He deserved it to. Imo, Michael Jackson’s 1983 was the greatest year for an artist in music history. He changed the entire landscape with only three music videos and 1 televised performance. 2 blockbuster number 1 singles and the best selling album of all time. He was everywhere, TV shows, radio, magazines, commercials, EVERYWHERE!
